title: Top 10 Unforgettable American Horror Story Couples
author: MsMojo
comment: Evan and taissa just have the greatest romantical chemistry on the show
Tate and Violet.. the OG couple. 🖤
And most of them are Evan Peters, lol!!
Liz Taylor and Tristan was such a sad end. That was Denis O’hare’s best acting on any AHS season.
description:
These "American Horror Story" couples found love in unlikely places. For this list, we’ll be looking at a few of the show's more memorable pairings, as well as some fan favorites that showed us true love can flourish even in the darkest of places. Our countdown includes Kyle Spencer & Zoe Benson, Luke Ramsey & Nan, Liz Taylor & Tristan Duffy, and more! Which "AHS" couple is YOUR favorite? Let us know in the comments!

Watch more great "AHS" videos here: 
Top 10 Female American Horror Story Characters -
